QuestData.Title: Carcass Collection
QuestData.Description: These organs be a good start, mon, but we still be needin' lotsa other tings. Normally, we'd be gettin' stuff from family now, but dats only me and my sistah's boy, and Tony ain't worth it!$B$BSo, we be substitutin' some stuff. Lotsa carcasses, in fact!$B$BDeep down in the Shimmering Deep, there's tons of dem from when the water came rushin' in. Killed all of dem creatures. Go down there and bring me up some.
QuestData.CompletionText: Ya gots to get me lotsa those carcasses, mon! We not be rid of his foolish spirit if ya don't!
QuestData.RewardText: Oh, that's disgustin'!$B$BWe almost there, mon. Just need ta do one more ting!
